title: Fun time
text: This was our first time doing an escape room and we did the fort room. We had fun, 2 adults and 11 year old. It was very challenging especially since some of the props/clues with numbers had worn off. I'd say we maybe got halfway through in the hour allotted time.

title: New pirate ship ferry
text: They just unveiled a new pirate ship ferry over to Mackinac Island. Kids loved it and it has water cannons that spray water outside of the boat. Staff all dressed in pirate costumes.

title: Everything was okay
text: We enjoyed the casual lincoln log type atmosphere. Service was slow, but I feel that's to be expected right now with Covid and extra precautions. We had steak, salad, and the mac n cheese with pulled pork, food was average. Out of everything I'd say we enjoyed the macaroni with pulled pork the best.

title: Easy to get to
text: Short walk to the waterfall , 800ft to falls. Very cool to see and plenty of parking and restrooms. Everyone enjoyed these falls.

title: Great breakfast sandwiches
text: All of us were stoked with the great breakfast sandwiches freshly made. We also enjoyed the cinnamon roll and coffee. Was very quaint with old books and art

title: Great time
text: We visited 3 waterfalls and this was our favorite! Easy to walk, giftshop, trout pound where you can feed fish, and a gnome scavenger hunt with a prize for kids. Everyone enjoyed this.

title: We loved it
text: 4 adults and 1 child, we all loved it so much! You get to see the shipwrecks so good! So many great pictures!

title: Great spot
text: This is a great spot in kaanapali. The food is decent and the mai tais are a must! Late night happy hour is a plus.

title: One of the best massage experience
text: What a great experience. I did an 80 min massage with Ginger and it was exceptional. The massage was in an outdoor enclosed lanai which was soothing. A variety of techniques were used including hot stones and hot towels. My areas of concern were addressed and I am one happy camper. Will definitely be back.

title: Always a favorite
text: There is usually a wait but always worth it because the food never disappoints. Will always stop here in Oahu since we don't have one on Maui.

title: Lots of stairs
text: This is a great hike and lots of stairs uphill, but worth doing when in oahu. Definitely bring water and try to go early before the heat gets too bad.

title: New year's eve
text: We just finished a 4 course pre fixed menu for new year's. We were handed champagne as we walked in the door. Everything was amazing and the scallops and waygu steak were exceptional.

title: Such an experience
text: I've gone for both sunrise and sunset and both are spectacular. For sunrise you have to get up really early and make reservations though. Definitely a must see.

title: Good lil Chinese place
text: This place has decent Chinese and never disappoints. Everything is priced fair and they have a small patio with outdoor seating.

title: Casual spot
text: This is a great spot right off the beach walk. It gets busy quite often for dinner. This is a great casual spot anytime of day and close to many resorts.

title: Good casual
text: Good casual spot with open air. Love their specialty mai tais. Food is casual and good. Dessert is pies and they're ok.

title: What an experience
text: We did the all of Maui eco tour and it was amazing. We got to see big waterfalls and flew up by the crater. I would definitely recommend this.

title: Great time
text: We went out for a dinner cruise that was very relaxing. Staff was attentive and the food was the best I've ever had on any boating expedition.

title: Great dinner
text: The steak and fish were both great. There was a fire dancer at sunset right outside restaurant for a mini show. My favorite was the coconut mochi!

title: Amazing
text: We found this place right by our hotel and it was simply amazing! The pasta was better than some we had in Italy. The desserts were also amazing and ended up going twice in the few days were were in Athens.

title: Great museum
text: There is a lot to see here and some fascinating stuff. The confusing thing was some areas were ok to take pictures and other areas were not...it wasn't really marked or indicated which was which and they would just tell you to stop taking pictures. The food at the restaurant wasn't great but coffee was good.

title: Must see
text: Of course when in Athens this is a must see. There is something special about being in a place with so much history.

title: Cool history spot
text: We went here after suggested by hotel staff. It was cool to see the history unburied. We just walked through ourselves but saw there were tours going through as well.

title: Love
text: This was such a cute place to stay! Staff was so nice and drove us wherever we wanted to go. They also arranged a massage in my room which was great as well. The breakfast room was lovely overlooking the water.

title: Great food
text: One of the few restaurants that we went back to it was so good. We had steak and shrimp and for dessert tiramisu. Everything was great!

title: Must see
text: Of course you have to see the Colosseum when in Rome, we opted for the underground tour which takes you underneath the stage to where the gladiators and animals were kept, you also got to see all levels of Colosseum that were closed off. Definitely worth it.

title: Beautiful
text: When in Rome this is a must see both daytime and in the evening when it's all lit up. Will always stop here in Rome.

title: One of our favorites
text: We started our 2 week vacay in Europe with this old style beautiful hotel. It ended up being one of our favorites. Right next to Pantheon and right smack in the middle of everything so easy to walk to everything.

title: Good work and deals
text: Just finished a Hawaiian bliss massage with Teresa and it was great! She used a variety of techniques and she could tell where my body needed work. Very nice and quiet, with good deals and packages, will be back.

title: Best view
text: We had the best lunch here. We had so many people taking care of us at the front table it was ridiculous.

title: Chill dinner/happy hour
text: This was a cool spot and we did a mixture of dinner and happy hour at the bar top. Good happy hour menu with pupus and drinks.

title: Great place with everything
text: This place was amazing! Loved the adult pool, so quiet. The village literally had everything you could need with tons of options for food and shopping...everything from Louis Vuitton to local type shops.
place: Hilton Hawaiian Village Waikiki Beach Resort

title: Good food and shakes
text: Great burger's and vegetarian options. Always love to take friends and family here when they visit. Adult shakes and regular shakes too.

title: Rude receptionist
text: I stopped by the spa and the male receptionist was rude, wrong attitude for a spa...will be going elsewhere.
